thoughts.text: Now that the Python script to interface with the DALL-E API and generate images from text prompts has been created, I need to test the function to ensure it is working correctly.
thoughts.reasoning: Now that the Python script to interface with the DALL-E API and generate images from text prompts has been created, I need to test the function to ensure it is working correctly.
thoughts.plan:
- Define a test prompt
- Call the generate_image function with the test prompt
- Display the generated image to ensure it was generated correctly
thoughts.criticism: Generating images may be computationally intensive, so I will need to be mindful of resource usage. Additionally, there may be limitations on the number of API requests that can be made, so I will need to be mindful of this as well.
